sentence.Network_en: Labour support remained strong and unbroken by the depression.

encyclopedia.content: 专辑小名片 专辑名称：unbroken 歌手：Demi Lovato 音乐风格：流行 发行日期：2011-09-20 专辑简介 之前黛米·洛瓦托 (Demi Lovato) 接连发生自残、饮食紊乱、与舞蹈演员肢体冲突、入院接受精神治疗等状况，不得不退出了《Camp Rock 2》巡演进入康复中心疗养。今年1月，黛米·洛瓦托 (Demi Lovato) 离开康复中心，投入到新专辑《Unbroken》的宣传中，宣告她健康地回来了！ 2010年对Demi来说是艰难的一年，尽管如此，各种可喜可贺

entry.tran: 连续不断的；未被打断的；完整的；未破损的
entry.def: If something is unbroken, it is continuous or complete and has not been interrupted or broken.

example.ex: We've had ten days of almost unbroken sunshine...
example.tran: 我们这儿连续10天差不多都是阳光明媚。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by continuous or uninterrupted extension in space or time or sequence;
2. not subdued or trained for service or use;
4. (especially of promises or contracts) not violated or disregarded;
5. not broken; whole and intact; in one piece;
